Video (5 seconds in duration) would not send over WhatsApp. Loading bar initially appears, hangs, and then disappears.
PT noted worsening headache. She attributed it to use of camera on glasses as part of activity.
PT noted that they tried to send very short (4 seconds long) videos, but would not send via WhatsApp.
PT had difficulty pausing music on Spotify from the glasses.
PT noted that their headache has worsened the longer they’ve worn the glasses.
PT noted that the quality of music on Spotify is fantastic, comparable to headphones, except it has superior transparency for background awareness. Overall, highly impressed.
PT unable to toggle on a realistic map view with satellite imagery. PT wished this feature was present.
PT noted that they could wear the glasses for about 4 hours before discomfort became such that they would not want to wear them.

PT remarked that hand gestures have become second nature, though there are still instances where hand gestures require a couple of attempts or the device registers the incorrect action from an intended hand gesture.
PT wishes there was a convenient way to monitor battery of glasses without having to check phone.
